title: User Login System
description: As a user, I want to securely log into the application using my email and password so that I can access my personalized account and protected features.

acceptanceTests.description: User can successfully log in with valid email and password
System displays appropriate error message for invalid credentials
System creates secure session after successful authentication
System prevents brute force attacks with rate limiting after failed attempts
Passwords are securely hashed and never stored in plain text
